-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | explicit computation of determinant of small matrices
--   
@package explicit-determinant
@version 0.1.0.0

module Numeric.Determinant.Explicit

-- | compute the determinant of the top left sub-matrix of given size,
--   which can be in [1..5]
det :: Num a => Int -> [[a]] -> a
